title: Savollarni to'g'ri berish
desc:
If you are a self-taught developer like me, then chances are you learned everything about being a developer online — whether it was through Bootcamp, Google, Stack Overflow, Udemy, or any other online platform that offers cheap or even free courses and resources.
However, you can never become as good a developer as you want to be if you don’t understand the concepts, fundamentals, and ways of thinking that are taught only in an academic setting.
